title: Thanksgiving NFL Recap; Cowboys embarrassed, Bears bleat Blough, Onside Kick Mania (Football 11/29)
description:
Will Brinson is joined by Ryan Wilson, John Breech and Sean Wagner-McGough to recap the 3 Thanksgiving games across the NFL. The Pick Six Superfriends start by breaking down the Bills beating the Cowboys and what it means for Jason Garrett's future in Dallas while also acknowledging the impressive effort from Buffalo. The guys then credit Mitchell Trubisky's performance in the Bears victory over the Lions and analyze a wild sequence of onsides kicks to end the nightcap between the Falcons and Saints. 
 
To learn more about listener data and our privacy practices visit: https://www.audacyinc.com/privacy-policy
